definition: lit. verdant hills and limpid water (idiom)/fig. enchanting scenery
surname Shan
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
Qing or Ch'ing dynasty of imperial China (1644-1911)/surname Qing
clear/distinct/quiet/just and honest/pure/to settle or clear up/to clean up or purge
surname Shui
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
handsome/refined/elegant/graceful/superior/show (loanword)/CL:場|场[chang2]/(literary) to grow/to bloom/(of crops) to produce ears

sentences.english: The scenery here has great charm, reminding one of the land of Guilin.
sentences.chinese: 这里山清水秀，宛然桂林风光。

sentences.english: First of all, the air there is very good, with picturesque scenery.
sentences.chinese: 首先，因为那里的空气非常好，山清水秀。

sentences.english: Forest-clad mountains and limpid streams complete the scene here.
sentences.chinese: 这里山清水秀，景色优美。

sentences.english: His script works include In Anticipation, The Only Son.
sentences.chinese: 编剧作品有《在期待之中》《山清水秀》等。

sentences.english: World renowned tourist resort in Beidaihe, a beautiful, beautiful scenery.
sentences.chinese: 驰名中外的旅游胜地北戴河，山清水秀，风光旖旎。

sentences.english: This institute has a Health Base in the MiYun County, it is a wonderful place.
sentences.chinese: 该研究院在山清水秀的密云县建有基地。

definition: lit. verdant hills and limpid water (idiom)/fig. enchanting scenery
mountains on one side and water on the other
lit. green hills and clear waters/pleasant country scene (idiom)
lit. birdsong and fragrant flowers (idiom); fig. the intoxication of a beautiful spring day
illustrious hero, spirit of the place (idiom); a place derives reflected glory from an illustrious son
see 桃花源[tao2 hua1 yuan2]
nature and scenery
(of a location) beautiful and tranquil
range upon range of mountains (idiom)
(of scenery) stunning/spectacular/picturesque
(of an area) to have trees with shade-giving foliage/(of a road) to be tree-lined
tourist center
place of cultural interest
scenic lakes and mountain (idiom); beautiful lake and mountain landscape
overlapping ranges of high mountains (idiom)
heaven on Earth/nickname for the city Suzhou
